select p.idx as productIdx, p.name as productName, p.product_type as productType, p.description as productDescription, p.price, p.discount, p.discount_price as discountPrice, p.seller_type as sellerType, p.seller_idx as sellerIdx, avg(un.user_satisfaction) as productSatisfaction from product as p LEFT JOIN users_notes as un ON un.note_category = #{noteCategory} AND un.note_target = p.idx WHERE p.closed_sale > current_date() OR p.closed_sale is null GROUP BY p.idx, p.name, p.product_type, p.description, p.price, p.discount, p.discount_price, p.seller_type, p.seller_idx

SELECT ft.idx as freeTalkIdx, ft.photo_count as photoCount, ft.title, ft.writer as writerIdx, ft.writer_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, ft.reg_date as regDate, ft.last_updated as updateDate, ft.like_count as likeCount, ft.reply_count as replyCount, ( select group_concat(image_path separator ',') from attached_file_management as afm where afm.target_idx = ft.idx and afm.category = 2) as imagePath, ( select group_concat(image_file_name separator ',') from attached_file_management as afm where afm.target_idx = ft.idx and afm.category = 2) as imageFileName FROM free_talks as ft LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON ft.writer = ui.user_idx WHERE ft.exposeyn = '1'

SELECT un.idx as noteIdx, un.writer as writerIdx, ui.user_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, un.reg_date as regDate, un.update_date as updateDate, un.user_satisfaction as userSatisfaction, un.hashtag, un.content, un.like_count as likeCount, un.reply_count as replyCount, un.photo_count as photoCount FROM users_notes as un LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON un.writer = ui.user_idx WHERE un.idx = #{noteIdx}

SELECT ft.idx as freeTalkIdx, ft.title, ft.writer as writerIdx, ft.writer_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, ft.reg_date as regDate, ft.last_updated as updateDate, ft.photo_count as photoCount, ft.content, ft.like_count as likeCount, ft.reply_count as replyCount FROM free_talks as ft LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON ft.writer = ui.user_idx WHERE ft.idx = #{freeTalkIdx}

select re.iseq as replyIdx, ui.user_img_idx as userImgIdx, img.image_path as imagePath, img.image_file_name as imageFileName, re.user_idx as writerIdx, ui.user_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, re.reg_date as regDate, re.update_date as updateDate, re.content, re.hidden_yn as hiddenYN from reply as re left join users_info as ui on ui.user_idx = re.user_idx left join users_images as img on ui.user_img_idx = img.iseq where category = #{replyCategory} AND target_idx = #{postIdx} AND del_yn = '0'
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(idx) from users_notes
INSERT INTO users_notes ( note_category, note_target, user_satisfaction, use_start_date, use_end_date, content, hashtag, writer, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{noteCategory}, #{targetIdx}, #{userSatisfaction}, #{useStartDate}, #{useEndDate}, #{content}, #{hashtag}, #{userIdx}, now() )
mapper.update: update users_notes set note_target = #{targetIdx}, user_satisfaction = #{userSatisfaction}, use_start_date = #{useStartDate}, use_end_date = #{useEndDate}, content = #{content}, hashtag = #{hashtag}, update_date = now() where idx = #{postIdx}
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(idx) from free_talks
INSERT INTO free_talks ( title, content, writer, writer_name, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writerIdx}, #{writerName}, now() );
mapper.update: update free_talks set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, last_updated = now() where idx = #{postIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attached_file_management( image_file_name, image_path, category, target_idx, main_image_yn, expose_yn ) VALUES ( #{filename}, #{fileurl}, #{category}, #{postIdx}, '0', #{exposeYN} )
mapper.update: update attached_file_management set target_idx = '0' where target_idx = #{postIdx} AND category = #{category}
mapper.select: SELECT ptpu.pt_trainer_idx as PTTrainerIdx, ptpu.user_idx as userIdx, ptpu.date_start as dateStart, ptpu.date_end as dateEnd, ptpu.product_idx as productIdx, p.seller_idx as PTTrainerIdx, ptib.pt_trainer_name as PTTrainerName, ptib.nick_name as nickName, ptib.affilated_center as affilatedCenter, sib.store_name as storeName FROM pt_trainer_pt_users as ptpu LEFT JOIN product as p ON ptpu.product_idx = p.idx LEFT JOIN pt_trainer_info_basic as ptib ON p.seller_idx = ptib.pt_trainer_idx LEFT JOIN stores_info_basic as sib ON sib.store_idx = ptib.affilated_center WHERE ptpu.user_idx = #{userIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET content = #{content}, update_date = now(), hidden_yn = #{hiddenYN} WHERE iseq = #{replyIdx};
UPDATE reply SET del_yn = '1' WHERE iseq = #{replyIdx};
mapper.delete: delete from bbldb.like where category = #{category} AND target_idx = #{targetIdx} AND user_idx = #{userIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT l.iseq, ft.idx as freeTalkIdx, ft.photo_count as photoCount, afm.image_path as imagePath, afm.image_file_name as imageFileName, ft.title, ft.writer as writerIdx, ft.writer_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, ft.reg_date as regDate, ft.last_updated as updateDate, ft.like_count as likeCount, ft.reply_count as replyCount FROM bbldb.like as l LEFT JOIN free_talks as ft ON ft.idx = l.target_idx LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON ft.writer = ui.user_idx LEFT JOIN attached_file_management as afm ON ft.idx = afm.target_idx AND afm.category = 2 AND afm.main_image_yn = 1 WHERE l.user_idx = #{userIdx} AND l.category = #{category}

SELECT l.iseq, un.idx as noteIdx, un.note_category as noteCategory, un.writer as writerIdx, ui.user_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, un.reg_date as regDate, un.update_date as updateDate, un.user_satisfaction as userSatisfaction, afm.image_path as imagePath, afm.image_file_name as imageFileName, un.hashtag, un.content, un.like_count as likeCount, un.reply_count as replyCount, un.photo_count as photoCount FROM bbldb.like as l LEFT JOIN users_notes as un ON l.target_idx = un.idx LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON un.writer = ui.user_idx LEFT JOIN attached_file_management as afm ON un.idx = afm.target_idx AND afm.category = '1' WHERE l.user_idx = #{userIdx} AND l.category = #{category}

SELECT ft.idx as freeTalkIdx, afm.image_path as imagePath, afm.image_file_name as imageFileName, ft.title, ft.writer as writerIdx, ft.writer_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, ft.reg_date as regDate, ft.last_updated as updateDate, ft.reply_count as replyCount, ft.like_count as likeCount, ft.photo_count as photoCount FROM free_talks as ft LEFT JOIN attached_file_management as afm ON afm.target_idx = ft.idx AND afm.category = "2" AND afm.main_image_yn = 1 LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON ui.user_idx = ft.writer WHERE ft.writer = #{userIdx};

SELECT un.idx as noteIdx, un.note_category as noteCategory, un.writer as writerIdx, ui.user_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, un.reg_date as regDate, un.update_date as updateDate, un.user_satisfaction as userSatisfaction, afm.image_path as imagePath, afm.image_file_name as imageFileName, un.hashtag, un.content, un.like_count as likeCount, un.reply_count as replyCount, un.photo_count as photoCount FROM users_notes as un LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON ui.user_idx = un.writer LEFT JOIN attached_file_management as afm ON afm.target_idx = un.idx AND afm.category = "1" WHERE writer = #{userIdx}

SELECT re.iseq, re.category as boardCategory, re.target_idx as targetIdx, re.user_idx as writerIdx, ui.user_name as writerName, ui.nick_name as writerNickName, re.content, re.reg_date as regDate, re.update_date as updateDate, re.hidden_yn as hiddenYN FROM reply as re LEFT JOIN users_info as ui ON re.user_idx = ui.user_idx WHERE re.user_idx = #{userIdx} AND re.del_yn = "0"
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(iseq)+1 from users_images
INSERT INTO users_images( image_file_name, image_path ) VALUES ( #{filename}, #{fileurl} )
INSERT INTO inquiries( title, content, writer, writer_name, reg_date, processing_status ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{userIdx}, #{writerName}, now(), "1" )
mapper.select: SELECT idx, writer_name as writerName, title, reg_date as regDate, processing_status as processingStatus FROM inquiries WHERE writer = #{userIdx}
SELECT idx, content, reg_date as regDate FROM answers_to_inquiries WHERE inquiries_idx = #{inquiriesIdx}
SELECT idx, title, reg_date as regDate, last_updated as lastUpdated, writer, set_period as setPeriod, notice_start as noticeStart, notice_end as noticeEnd FROM notice WHERE noticeyn ='1'
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(iseq) from deleted_users
INSERT INTO deleted_users(user_idx, id, last_access) (SELECT idx, id, last_access FROM users WHERE idx = #{userIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users_saving_points WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx} AND period_of_validity > current_date() ORDER BY saving_date asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users_subtraction_points(subtraction_date, user_idx, saving_point_idx, subtraction_type, subtraction_point, transaction_idx) VALUES (now(), #{userIdx}, #{savingPointsIseq}, #{subtractionType}, #{subtractionPoint}, #{transactionIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct p.product_type as productType, p.seller_type as sellerType, p.seller_idx as sellerIdx, ptib.affilated_center as affilatedCenter, ptib.pt_trainer_name as PTTrainerName, ptib.nick_name as nickName, sib.store_name as storeName, vt.valid_yn as validYN FROM valid_ticket as vt LEFT JOIN product as p ON vt.product_idx = p.idx LEFT JOIN pt_trainer_info_basic as ptib ON p.seller_type = "2" AND p.seller_idx = ptib.pt_trainer_idx LEFT JOIN stores_info_basic as sib ON (p.seller_type = "1" AND p.seller_idx = sib.store_idx) OR (ptib.affilated_center = sib.store_idx) WHERE vt.consumer_idx = #{userIdx}
mapper.delete: DELETE vt FROM valid_ticket vt join product as p on p.idx = vt.product_idx WHERE p.seller_idx = #{sellerIdx} AND vt.consumer_idx = #{userIdx};
mapper.insert: insert into messages (title, content, sender_type, sender_idx, receiver_type, receiver_idx, send_date_time, message_type, typeIdx) value (#{title}, #{content}, '1', #{userIdx}, #{receiverType}, #{receiverIdx}, now(), #{messageType}, #{typeIdx})
